verses.verse: What <S%G5101><s%> shall we say <S%G2046><s%> then? <S%G3767><s%> Shall we continue <S%G1961><s%> in sin, <S%G266><s%> that grace <S%G5485><s%> may abound? <S%G4121><s%>

God <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1096><s%> forbid. <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1096><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> shall we, that are dead <S%G599><s%> to sin, <S%G266><s%> live <S%G2198><s%> any <S%G2089><s%> longer <S%G2089><s%> therein? <S%G1722><s%>

Know <S%G50><s%> you not, that so <S%G3745><s%> many <S%G3745><s%> of us as were baptized <S%G907><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> were baptized <S%G907><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his death? <S%G2288><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> we are buried <S%G4916><s%> with him by baptism <S%G908><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> death: <S%G2288><s%> that like <S%G5618><s%> as Christ <S%G5547><s%> was raised <S%G1453><s%> up from the dead <S%G3498><s%> by the glory <S%G1391><s%> of the Father, <S%G3962><s%> even so <S%G3779><s%> we also <S%G2532><s%> should walk <S%G4043><s%> in newness <S%G2538><s%> of life. <S%G2222><s%>

For if <S%G1487><s%> we have been planted <S%G4854><s%> together <S%G4854><s%> in the likeness <S%G3667><s%> of his death, <S%G2288><s%> we shall be also <S%G2532><s%> in the likeness of his resurrection: <S%G386><s%>

Knowing <S%G1097><s%> this, <S%G5124><s%> that our old <S%G3820><s%> man <S%G444><s%> is crucified <S%G4957><s%> with him, that the body <S%G4983><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%> might be destroyed, <S%G2673><s%> that from now on <S%G3371><s%> we should not serve <S%G1398><s%> sin. <S%G266><s%>
For he that is dead <S%G599><s%> is freed <S%G1344><s%> from sin. <S%G266><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> we be dead <S%G599><s%> with Christ, <S%G5547><s%> we believe <S%G4100><s%> that we shall also <S%G2532><s%> live <S%G4800><s%> with him:

Knowing <S%G1492><s%> that Christ <S%G5547><s%> being raised <S%G1453><s%> from the dead <S%G3498><s%> dies <S%G599><s%> no <S%G3765><s%> more; <S%G2089><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> has no <S%G3765><s%> more <S%G3765><s%> dominion <S%G2961><s%> over him.
For in that he died, <S%G599><s%> he died <S%G599><s%> to sin <S%G266><s%> once: <S%G2178><s%> but in that he lives, <S%G2198><s%> he lives <S%G2198><s%> to God. <S%G2316><s%>

Likewise <S%G3779><s%> reckon <S%G3049><s%> you also <S%G2532><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> to be dead <S%G3498><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> to sin, <S%G266><s%> but alive <S%G2198><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> our Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Let not sin <S%G266><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> reign <S%G936><s%> in your <S%G5216><s%> mortal <S%G2349><s%> body, <S%G4983><s%> that you should obey <S%G5219><s%> it in the lusts <S%G1939><s%> thereof. <S%G846><s%>

Neither <S%G3366><s%> yield <S%G3936><s%> you your <S%G5216><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> as instruments <S%G3696><s%> of unrighteousness <S%G93><s%> to sin: <S%G266><s%> but yield <S%G3936><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> to God, <S%G2316><s%> as those that are alive <S%G2198><s%> from the dead, <S%G3498><s%> and your <S%G5216><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> as instruments <S%G3696><s%> of righteousness <S%G1343><s%> to God. <S%G2316><s%>
For sin <S%G266><s%> shall not have dominion <S%G2961><s%> over you: for you are not under <S%G5259><s%> the law, <S%G3551><s%> but under <S%G5259><s%> grace. <S%G5485><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> then? <S%G3767><s%> shall we sin, <S%G264><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> we are not under <S%G5259><s%> the law, <S%G3551><s%> but under <S%G5259><s%> grace? <S%G5485><s%> God <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1096><s%> forbid. <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1096><s%>

Know <S%G1492><s%> you not, that to whom <S%G3739><s%> you yield <S%G3936><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> to obey, <S%G5218><s%> his servants <S%G1401><s%> you are to whom <S%G3739><s%> you obey; <S%G5219><s%> whether <S%G2273><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%> to death, <S%G2288><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> of obedience <S%G5218><s%> to righteousness? <S%G1343><s%>

But God <S%G2316><s%> be thanked, <S%G5485><s%> that you were the servants <S%G1401><s%> of sin, <S%G266><s%> but you have obeyed <S%G5219><s%> from the heart <S%G2588><s%> that form <S%G5179><s%> of doctrine <S%G1322><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> was delivered <S%G3860><s%> you.
Being then <S%G1161><s%> made <S%G1659><s%> free <S%G1659><s%> from sin, <S%G266><s%> you became <S%G1402><s%> the servants <S%G1402><s%> of righteousness. <S%G1343><s%>

I speak <S%G3004><s%> after the manner <S%G442><s%> of men <S%G442><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the infirmity <S%G769><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> flesh: <S%G4561><s%> for as you have yielded <S%G3936><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> to uncleanness <S%G167><s%> and to iniquity <S%G458><s%> to iniquity; <S%G458><s%> even <S%G3779><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> yield <S%G3936><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> to righteousness <S%G1343><s%> to holiness. <S%G38><s%>
For when <S%G3753><s%> you were the servants <S%G1401><s%> of sin, <S%G266><s%> you were free <S%G1658><s%> from righteousness. <S%G1343><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> you then <S%G5119><s%> <S%G3767><s%> in those things whereof <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3739><s%> you are now <S%G3568><s%> ashamed? <S%G1870><s%> for the end <S%G5056><s%> of those <S%G1565><s%> things is death. <S%G2288><s%>

But now <S%G3570><s%> being made <S%G1659><s%> free <S%G1659><s%> from sin, <S%G266><s%> and become <S%G1402><s%> servants <S%G1402><s%> to God, <S%G2316><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> to holiness, <S%G38><s%> and the end <S%G5056><s%> everlasting <S%G166><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>

For the wages <S%G3800><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%> is death; <S%G2288><s%> but the gift <S%G5486><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is eternal <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> our Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
